DOC.brief_summary: Collect OCT data evaluate range age trend eye measurement .
DOC.brief_title: Optical Coherence Tomography ( OCT ) Data Collection Study
DOC.criteria: At least 18 year age Able willing provide consent Able willing complete require examininations visit Refractive error within 8 diopter sphere within 2 diopter cylinder eye Best correct visual acuity 20/30 good eye History leukemia , AIDS , dementia multiple sclerosis Concomitant use hydroxycloroquine chloroquine Family history glaucoma among first degree relatives Intraocular pressure 22mm Hg great either eye Unreliable abnormal visual field Active ocular disease Previously diagnose glaucoma glaucoma suspect Congenital ocular abnormality Previous intraocular surgery laser treatment ( refractive surgery uncomplicated cataract surgery great 6 month previously ) Anatomic narrow angle
